short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leverage a greedy-min-max algorithm, find the best guesses for even the trickiest words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make the best Wordle guesses.

Wordle Assistant uses a greedy-min-max algorithm to determine which words reduce the possible word pool the most. The scores presented indicated the worst-case and average percent of the word pool that will be culled upon guessing the word.

The visibility of word suggestions can be toggled on and off at any time.
